LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship Scheme.Description: Scholarship program for meritorious students of economically weaker families.
LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship Scheme.Eligibility Criteria: Open for students who have passed the 10th and 12th board exams.
LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship Scheme.Selection Process: Based on merit in the board exams and family income criteria.

OICL Scholarship.Description: Scholarship program for meritorious students from families of OICL policyholders.
OICL Scholarship.Eligibility Criteria: Open for students who have passed the 12th board exam.
OICL Scholarship.Selection Process: Based on merit in the board exam and policyholder status.

NICL Scholarship.Description: Scholarship program for meritorious students from families of NICL policyholders.
NICL Scholarship.Eligibility Criteria: Open for students who have passed the 12th board exam.
NICL Scholarship.Selection Process: Based on merit in the board exam and policyholder status.
